OOC: Clever, Alloran! Very inquisitive of you to read my mind.

BIC: Shokar=
act: You know. That doesn't sound like a bad idea right now at all. Let's d=
o it.
~~~~~
Deemos: It doesn't matter how long you took, the important part=
 is that you are here. We are going to attack the Chivtron base under a bri=
ef alliance with these 3 Maximals and we are going to eliminate as many of =
them and their petty little army as we possibly can.

Airbomber: We are fri=
iiiendly.

Deemos looks angrily at Airbomber.

Airbomber: What?

Stranato: =
Let's just go, they are just right in that direction.

Airbomber, Stranato,=
 and Train Wreck, the last 3 surviving Radicons, walk off towards the Chivt=
ron base. Deemos waits until Sharpedge starts walking (If he does) and stay=
s alongside him...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Alloran2@...=
m 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, May 17, 2001 5:02 PM

ubject: triple feature post

edge::: 

  ::They hear the order to retreat, transform and start flying ba=
ck to base:: 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::Godfather turns to Shockaract:: 
  Godfather: He=
y, why don't we join the Decepticons? 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::Sharpedge reaches Deemo=
s' position::

 me for?
